desmoj.extensions.space3D

Class SpatialData

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.extensions.space3D.SpatialData

  • public class SpatialData
extends java.lang.Object
    The SpatialData contains the spatial and physical attributes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpatialData()
      Constructs a SpatialData object without specifying the data.
      SpatialData(double[] matrixData)
      Constructs a SpatialData object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.vecmath.Matrix4d getMatrix()
      Returns the matrix which contains the spatial data.
      double getPosX()
      Returns the x-position.

      Returns the y-position.
      double getPosZ()
      Returns the z-position.
      void resetRotation()
      Resets the rotational data
      void rotX(double angle)
      Rotates the spatial attribute counter-clockwise about the x-axis.

      Rotates the spatial attribute counter-clockwise about the y-axis.
      void rotZ(double angle)
      Rotates the spatial attribute counter-clockwise about the z-axis.

      Sets the matrix.

      Sets a new Position.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpatialData

        public SpatialData()
        Constructs a SpatialData object without specifying the data. All data are set to zero.

      • SpatialData

        public SpatialData(double[] matrixData)
        Constructs a SpatialData object.
        Parameters:
        matrixData - The spatial data represented with a double[16] matrix. It begins with the first element in the first row, then the second element in the first row etc.
